Title: Double Lover
Writer: François Ozon (scenario), Joyce Carol Oates (freely adapted from the novel "Lives of the Twins"), Philippe Piazzo (collaboration)
Actors: Marine Vacth, Jérémie Renier, Jacqueline Bisset, Myriam Boyer
Plot: Chloé, a fragile young woman, falls in love with her psychoanalyst, Paul. A few months later she moves in with him, but soon discovers that her lover is concealing a part of his identity.
